00025 #pragma mark -
00026 #pragma mark Logging
00027 // FTLOGEXT logging macro from: http://iphoneincubator.com/blog/debugging/the-evolution-of-a-replacement-for-nslog
00028 #ifdef DEBUG
00029 #define FTLOG(...) NSLog(__VA_ARGS__)
00030 #define FTLOGEXT(fmt, ...) NSLog((@"%s [Line %d] " fmt), __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__);
00031 #define FTLOGCALL FTLOG(@"[%@ %@]", NSStringFromClass([self class]), NSStringFromSelector(_cmd))
00032 #else
00033 #define FTLOG(...) /* */
00034 #define FTLOGEXT(...) /* */
00035 #define FTLOGCALL /* */
00036 #endif
00037 
00038 #pragma mark -
00039 #pragma mark Memory Management
00040 
00041 #define FTRELEASE(_obj) [_obj release], _obj = nil
00042 #define FTFREE(_ptr) if(_ptr != NULL) { free(_ptr); _ptr = NULL; }
00043 
00044 #pragma mark -
00045 #pragma mark Math
00046 
00047 #define DEGREES_TO_RADIANS(d) (d * M_PI / 180)
00048 #define RADIANS_TO_DEGREES(r) (r * 180 / M_PI)
00049 
00050 #pragma mark -
00051 #pragma mark Color Def Macros
00052 
00053 #define RGBCOLOR(r,g,b) [UIColor colorWithRed:r/256.f green:g/256.f blue:b/256.f alpha:1.f]
00054 #define RGBACOLOR(r,g,b,a) [UIColor colorWithRed:r/256.f green:g/256.f blue:b/256.f alpha:a]
00055 #define UIColorFromRGB(rgbValue) [UIColor \
00056                                    colorWithRed:((float)((rgbValue & 0xFF0000) >> 16))/255.0 \
00057                                           green:((float)((rgbValue & 0x00FF00) >> 8))/255.0 \
00058                                            blue:((float)(rgbValue & 0x0000FF))/255.0 \
00059                                           alpha:1.0]
00060 
00061 #define UIColorFromRGBA(rgbValue, alphaValue) [UIColor \
00062                                                 colorWithRed:((float)((rgbValue & 0xFF0000) >> 16))/255.0 \
00063                                                        green:((float)((rgbValue & 0x00FF00) >> 8))/255.0 \
00064                                                         blue:((float)(rgbValue & 0x0000FF))/255.0 \
00065                                                        alpha:alphaValue]
00066 
00067 #pragma mark -
00068 #pragma mark Delegate Helpers
00069 
00070 #define FT_CALL_DELEGATE(_delegate, _selector) \
00071 do { \
00072   id _theDelegate = _delegate; \
00073   if(_theDelegate != nil && [_theDelegate respondsToSelector:_selector]) { \
00074     [_theDelegate performSelector:_selector]; \
00075   } \
00076 } while(0);
00077 
00078 #define FT_CALL_DELEGATE_WITH_ARG(_delegate, _selector, _argument) \
00079 do { \
00080   id _theDelegate = _delegate; \
00081   if(_theDelegate != nil && [_theDelegate respondsToSelector:_selector]) { \
00082     [_theDelegate performSelector:_selector withObject:_argument]; \
00083   } \
00084 } while(0);
00085 
00086 #define FT_CALL_DELEGATE_WITH_ARGS(_delegate, _selector, _arg1, _arg2) \
00087 do { \
00088   id _theDelegate = _delegate; \
00089   if(_theDelegate != nil && [_theDelegate respondsToSelector:_selector]) { \
00090     [_theDelegate performSelector:_selector withObject:_arg1 withObject:_arg2]; \
00091   } \
00092 } while(0);
00093 
00094 #pragma mark -
00095 #pragma mark File System Helpers
00096 
00097 static inline NSString *FTPathForFileInDocumentsDirectory(NSString *filename) {
00098   NSArray *paths = NSSearchPathForDirectoriesInDomains(NSDocumentDirectory, NSUserDomainMask, YES);
00099   NSString *documentsDirectory = [paths objectAtIndex:0];
00100   NSString *path = [documentsDirectory stringByAppendingPathComponent:filename];
00101   return path;
00102 }
00103 
00104 #pragma mark -
00105 #pragma mark Core Data Helpers
00106 
00107 #define FT_SAVE_MOC(_ft_moc) \
00108 do { \
00109   NSError* _ft_save_error; \
00110   if(![_ft_moc save:&_ft_save_error]) { \
00111     FTLOG(@"Failed to save to data store: %@", [_ft_save_error localizedDescription]); \
00112     NSArray* _ft_detailedErrors = [[_ft_save_error userInfo] objectForKey:NSDetailedErrorsKey]; \
00113     if(_ft_detailedErrors != nil && [_ft_detailedErrors count] > 0) { \
00114       for(NSError* _ft_detailedError in _ft_detailedErrors) { \
00115         FTLOG(@"DetailedError: %@", [_ft_detailedError userInfo]); \
00116       } \
00117     } \
00118     else { \
00119       FTLOG(@"%@", [_ft_save_error userInfo]); \
00120     } \
00121   } \
00122 } while(0);
